title: [Code Quality] Replace unwrap() calls in crates/api-server/tests/api_routes.rs
body:
## Description
The file `crates/api-server/tests/api_routes.rs` contains 16 uses of `.unwrap()` which can cause panics.

## Suggested Fix
Replace with proper error handling using `?` operator or `.expect()`.

## File Location
`crates/api-server/tests/api_routes.rs`

title: [Feature] Multi-language support (i18n)
body:
## Description
Add internationalization support for the UI

## Acceptance Criteria
- Feature is fully implemented
- UI is intuitive and accessible
- Tests are added
- Documentation is updated

title: [Feature] Dark/Light theme toggle
body:
## Description
Add theme switching capability with user preference persistence

## Acceptance Criteria
- Feature is fully implemented
- UI is intuitive and accessible
- Tests are added
- Documentation is updated

title: [Feature] Proxy health monitoring dashboard
body:
## Description
Real-time dashboard showing proxy status, latency, and uptime

## Acceptance Criteria
- Feature is fully implemented
- UI is intuitive and accessible
- Tests are added
- Documentation is updated

title: [Feature] Export proxy configurations
body:
## Description
Allow exporting proxy settings to JSON/YAML formats

## Acceptance Criteria
- Feature is fully implemented
- UI is intuitive and accessible
- Tests are added
- Documentation is updated

body:

- Feature is fully implemented

body:

- Feature is fully implemented

body:

- Feature is fully implemented

body:

Time-based automatic proxy switching with schedules

- Feature is fully implemented
- UI is intuitive and accessible

Track and display data usage per proxy and tab

- Feature is fully implemented

Optimize connection reuse for better performance

- Feature is fully implemented
